menu.name: gameplay
menu.desc: Change gameplay options for VS Impostor such as middlescroll, camera movement, hitsounds...

number.name: BF Underlay Alpha
number.desc: Changes the transparency of the underlay for the player.

number.name: Dad Underlay Alpha
number.desc: Changes the transparency of the underlay for the opponent/second player.

checkbox.name: Camera Movement
checkbox.desc: If checked, the camera will move with the notes' direction.

checkbox.name: Middlescroll
checkbox.desc: If checked, centers the player's strums to the middle.

checkbox.name: Hide Note Splashes
checkbox.desc: If checked, the note splashes will be hidden.

checkbox.name: Hide opponent notes
checkbox.desc: If checked, will make the opponent's notes invisible.

checkbox.name: Hitsounds
checkbox.desc: If checked, a tick sound will occur on every note hit.

menu.name: visuals
menu.desc: Change visuals options for VS Impostor such as flashing lights, jumpscares, screen shaking...

checkbox.name: Mid-Song Vid Cutscenes
checkbox.desc: If checked, video cutscenes will play mid-song. (Uncheck if your PC is weak!)

checkbox.name: Flashing Lights
checkbox.desc: If checked, there will be flashing lights in some songs. (MAY BE SENSITIVE FOR PEOPLE WITH EPILEPSY)

checkbox.name: Screen Shake
checkbox.desc: If checked, screen shaking will occur in some songs.

checkbox.name: Window Shake
checkbox.desc: If checked, window shaking will occur in some songs and in some menus.

checkbox.name: Jumpscares
checkbox.desc: If checked, there will be jumpscares in certain songs.

menu.name: game hud
menu.desc: Change the HUD up when playing a song!

checkbox.name: Old Icon Bop
checkbox.desc: If checked, the icons will bop like the vanilla icon bop VS Impostor V4 uses.

checkbox.name: Timebar
checkbox.desc: If checked, there will be a timebar based on how much there is left in the song.

checkbox.name: Score Text Zoom on Hit
checkbox.desc: If unchecked, disables the Score text zooming everytime you hit a note.

checkbox.name: Colored Score Text
checkbox.desc: If checked, the score text will be colored by the opponent's icon color.

checkbox.name: Psych UI
checkbox.desc: If checked, the ui will look like psych engine's ui.

checkbox.name: System Cursor
checkbox.desc: If checked, your system's cursor will override the haxeflixel cursor. (You may need to restart the game in order for this to take effect.)

menu.name: languages
menu.desc: Change the current game's language. Leave all blank for english. (ALPHA)

checkbox.name: Arabic
checkbox.desc: Changes the game's language to Arabic.

checkbox.name: Warning on bootup
checkbox.desc: If checked, a warning will ALWAYS pop up when launching the port. Turn off if it gets annoying.

checkbox.name: Developer Mode
checkbox.desc: If checked, you get access to developer tools and editors. (Look at songs/devStuff.hx in the files for the tools you can use)
